sen.j: 父・文徳天皇は皇太子として第四皇子である惟仁親王（後の清和天皇）を立てた後、惟喬親王にも皇位を継承させようとしたが、藤原良房の反対を危惧した源信の諫言により実現できなかったといわれている。
sen.e: His father, Emperor Montoku appointed his forth Prince, Imperial Prince Korehito (later called Emperor Seiwa) as Crown Prince, and tried to let Imperial Prince Koretaka to succeed to the throne, however this did not happned as MINAMOTO no Makoto concerned that FUJIWARA no Yoshifusa would go against this and he remonstrated his concern to the Emperor.
